wikipedia_page.main: General Sir George Alexander Weir  (1 December 1876 – 15 November 1951) was a British Army officer who served in the Second Boer War and the First World War.

response: *General Sir George Alexander Weir, KCB, CMG, DSO (1876–1951), born in Upton
** 13th Cavalry Brigade commander Brigadier-General P. J. V. Kelly (to September 1918) Brigadier-General George Alexander Weir
*1929–1946: Gen. Sir George Alexander Weir, KCB, CMG, DSO
* Colonel (Temporary Colonel Commandant) George Alexander Weir, , Commandant, Equitation School, Weedon.
* Lieutenant-General George Alexander Weir, , Colonel, 3rd Carabiniers (Prince of Wales's Dragoon Guards), General Officer Commanding, The British Troops in Egypt.
